description: From summer rock routes in the Sierra to tedious ice leads in the heart of winter, the Black Diamond Factor Hoody delivers four-season, technical midlayer performance in a light, stretchy and quick-drying package. The hoody’s close-fitting, under-the helmet hood helps retain warmth on chilly approach pitches and lets you leave the beanie at home, while zippered hand and chest pockets secure small on-route essentials.
name: Black Diamond Factor Hoody - Mens
